document_data.name: The Gatereach Inn
document_data.mainbody: The '''Gatereach Inn''' was an expensive [[inn]] found just outside the city of [[Westgate]] in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Description: The inn was surrounded by a palisade.
document_data.Location: The inn was located outside of [[Mulsantirâ€™s Gate]] along the [[Trader's Road]].
document_data.Activities: This inn catered to wealthy merchants who cherished the inn's fine accommodations and could afford the prices. The inn withstood several raids by bandits and roving monsters over the years. All of the staff was vetted to ensure they had no connections to the criminal underworld of Westgate.
